column4: hey what can i do if i want to do a format in my PC so as not to loose my settings in the system? Is the backup of my HOME folder enough ???
depends what you want to back up :)  .. i back up /etc, /home, and other dirs w/valuable data
/etc/ is where all the settings are stored (mostly)... so save that one.. plus your own goodies at /home or some other dirs
